listitem.para: The Project window is the main window in &GMOJO_APP; where editing takes place. In this version the Project window will contain a menu, a Transport controller and a canvas containing Tracks.
The Mixer window is contains an environment for controlling track properties such as volume, pan and solo/mute status.
The connections window is where input and output busses are defined to route audio between &GMOJO_APP; and the audio hardware.
